data.title: Custom Vinyl Records
data.meta_description: CUSTOM RECORDS offers hard durable 10" 78rpm gramophone records for old wind-up phonograph players. These will last hundreds of plays with little wear to needle
data.text:
NEW IMPROVED HARD DURABLE 10" 78rpm disc for WIND-UP GRAMOPHONE PHONOGRAPH RECORD PLAYERS -- now with more hardness and gentle abrasive like the old original shellac records. This molded hard resin record (with abrasive mineral) allows up to 4 minutes music (one-side only) and will last a lifetime if used properly. We recommend changing the steel needle (soft or medium tone) every 2 plays as is normally suggested.

Custom printing of 10" tan paper record sleeves is available using dark color solid line artwork. Sleeves are available with hole or no hole.
